org.tinfour.gis.shapefile

Class DbfFieldInt

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tinfour.gis.shapefile.DbfField
      • org.tinfour.gis.shapefile.DbfFieldInt

  • public class DbfFieldInt
extends DbfField
    Extends DbfField with special handling for reading integer values.

      • getApplicationData

        public Object getApplicationData()
        Description copied from class: DbfField
        Gets the data for the field as an Object of the appropriate class. For the DbdField base class, the return value is a string. For others, the return type may vary.
        Overrides:
        getApplicationData in class DbfField
        Returns:
        an object, potentially null if the record has not been read.

      • getUniqueValueArray

        public int[] getUniqueValueArray(DbfFileReader dbf)
                          throws IOException
        Gets an array of unique values for this field.
        Parameters:
        dbf - a valid instance
        Returns:
        if successful an array of zero or more elements.
        Throws:
        IOException - in the event of an unrecoverable I/O condition.
